main.ts:
mbit_Robot.CarCtrlSpeed(mbit_Robot.CarState.Car_Run, 200)
basic.pause(1000)
mbit_Robot.CarCtrlSpeed(mbit_Robot.CarState.Car_Back, 200)
basic.pause(1000)
mbit_Robot.CarCtrlSpeed(mbit_Robot.CarState.Car_Left, 200)
basic.pause(1000)
mbit_Robot.CarCtrlSpeed(mbit_Robot.CarState.Car_Right, 200)
basic.pause(1000)
mbit_Robot.CarCtrlSpeed(mbit_Robot.CarState.Car_SpinLeft, 200)
basic.pause(1000)
mbit_Robot.CarCtrlSpeed(mbit_Robot.CarState.Car_SpinRight, 200)
basic.pause(1000)
mbit_Robot.CarCtrlSpeed(mbit_Robot.CarState.Car_Stop, 0)
basic.forever(function () {
	
})
